required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study of Urelumab in Subjects With Advanced and/or Metastatic Malignant Tumors
clinical_study.official_title: A Phase 1 Study of the Safety, Tolerability, Pharmacokinetics and Immunoregulatory Activity of Urelumab (BMS-663513) in Subjects With Advanced and/or Metastatic Malignant Tumors

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to assess the safety and tolerability of BMS-663513 in subjects with advanced and/or metastatic malignant tumors.

primary_outcome.measure: Safety of urelumab monotherapy as measured by the dose limiting toxicity (DLT) in subjects with advanced and/or metastatic malignant tumors
primary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 of treatment up to 60 days of follow-up

primary_outcome.measure: Safety of urelumab monotherapy as measured by adverse events (AEs) and serious adverse events (SAEs) in subjects with advanced and/or metastatic malignant tumors
primary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 of treatment up to 60 days of follow-up

primary_outcome.measure: Tolerability of urelumab monotherapy as measured by the DLT in subjects with advanced and/or metastatic malignant tumors
primary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 of treatment up to 60 days of follow-up

primary_outcome.measure: Tolerability of urelumab monotherapy as measured by AEs and SAEs in subjects with advanced and/or metastatic malignant tumors
primary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 of treatment up to 60 days of follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Safety of urelumab-nivolumab combination therapy as measured by AEs and SAEs in subjects with advanced and/or metastatic malignant tumors
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 of treatment up to 100 days of follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Tolerability of urelumab-nivolumab combination therapy as measured by AEs and SAEs in subjects with advanced and/or metastatic malignant tumors
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From day 1 of treatment up to 100 days of follow-up

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax (Maximum observed serum concentration) of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Ctrough (Trough observed serum concentration) of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax (Time of maximum observed serum concentration) of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(0-T) [Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to the last quantifiable concentration] of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(TAU) [Area under the concentration-time curve in one dosing interval] of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(INF) [Area under the concentration-time curve from time zero to infinity and the extrapolated area] of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: T-HALF (Elimination half life) of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: CLT (Total body clearance) of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Vss (Volume of distribution at steady state) of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: AI (Accumulation Index: ratio of AUC(TAU) and Cmax in cycle at steady state to those after the first cycle) of urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 7, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: Cmax of urelumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Coeff of urelumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Ctrough of urelumab and nivolumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Tmax of urelumab and nivolumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(0-T) of urelumab and nivolumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(TAU) of urelumab and nivolumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: AUC(INF) of urelumab and nivolumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: T-HALF of urelumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: CLT of urelumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Vss of urelumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Anti-drug Antibody (ADA) status of the subject in response to Urelumab when administered alone
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 4, 8, 12, 16, up to 60 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 21 days/cycle for Urelumab monotherapy

secondary_outcome.measure: ADA status of the subject in response to Urelumab and Nivolumab when co-administered
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 1, 2, 4, 5, 9, up to 100 days of follow up
secondary_outcome.description: 28 days/cycle for combination therapy of Urelumab and Nivolumab

secondary_outcome.measure: Best overall response (BOR) of urelumab monotherapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Every 6-8 weeks during the treatment period

secondary_outcome.measure: BOR of urelumab and nivolumab combination therapy
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Every 6-8 weeks during the treatment period

criteria.textblock:
For more information regarding BMS clinical trial participation, please visit www.BMSStudyConnect.com
Inclusion Criteria:
- Subjects with previously treated advanced malignant solid tumor
- Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status â‰¤ 1
- For certain subjects, willing and able to provide pre-treatment tumor sample
Exclusion Criteria:
- Known or suspected central nervous system metastases or central nervous system as the only source of disease
- Other concomitant malignancies (with some exceptions per protocol)
- Active, known or suspected autoimmune disease

overall_contact.last_name: Recruiting sites have contact information. Please contact the sites directly. If there is no contact information, please email:

overall_contact_backup.last_name: First line of the email MUST contain NCT# and Site #.
